verses.verse: (Ps. 135:10-12) And slew famous kings, For His mercy endures forever—
(Deut. 29:7) Sihon king of the Amorites, For His mercy endures forever;
(Num. 21:21) And Og king of Bashan, For His mercy endures forever—
(Num. 21:33) And gave their land as a heritage, For His mercy endures forever;
A heritage to Israel His servant, For His mercy endures forever.
Who (Josh. 12:1) remembered us in our lowly state, For His mercy endures forever;
And (Gen. 8:1; Deut. 32:36; Ps. 113:7) rescued us from our enemies, For His mercy endures forever;
(Ps. 44:7) Who gives food to all flesh, For His mercy endures forever.
Oh, give thanks to the God of heaven! For His mercy endures forever.
